00028 #define INVALID_FILE "../../parsers/data/test.file.full_array_file"
00029 #define CALVIN_FILE "../../parsers/data/test.file.grc"
00030 #define GCOS_FILE "../../../file/CPPTest/data/test.grc"

00042 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00043 {
00044         FusionGrcFileReader *reader = new FusionGrcFileReader;
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader != NULL);
00046         delete reader;
00047 }

00052         GridControlData data;

00056 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_missing_file()
00057 {
00058         FusionGrcFileReader reader;
00059         GridControlData data;
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read("no_file", data) == false);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_calvin_grc_file()
00064 {
00065         FusionGrcFileReader reader;
00066         GridControlData data;
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(CALVIN_FILE, data) == true);
00068 
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetColumns() == 5);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB1Probes() == 3);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB2Probes() == 2);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumNSProbes() == 1);
00074 
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).x == 0);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).y == 1);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).x == 2);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).y == 3);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).x == 4);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).y == 5);
00081 
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).x == 10);
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).y == 11);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).x == 12);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).y == 13);
00086 
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).x == 10);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).y == 20);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_gcos_grc_file()
00092 {
00093         FusionGrcFileReader reader;
00094         GridControlData data;
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(GCOS_FILE, data) == true);
00096 
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetRows() == 2) ;
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetColumns() == 2) ;
00099 
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNumB1Probes() == 1) ;
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB1(0).x == 1);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB1(0).y == 0);
00103 
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNumB2Probes() == 2) ;
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(0).x == 0);
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(0).y == 0);
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(1).x == 0);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(1).y == 1);
00109 
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNumNSProbes() == 1) ;
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNS(0).x == 1);
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNS(0).y == 1);
00113 
00114 }
